definition: see 嬉皮笑臉|嬉皮笑脸[xi1 pi2 xiao4 lian3]
When the girl smiles, the matchmaker's job is half done. (idiom)
pinyin: shao4 nu:3 lu4 xiao4 lian3 , hun1 shi4 ban4 cheng2 quan2
containing_words.word: 少女露笑脸，婚事半成全

definition: erhua variant of 笑臉|笑脸[xiao4 lian3]
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)

sentences.english: This allows you to change the emoticon theme that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 这将允许您变更要使用的笑脸主题。

sentences.english: They sprinkle their cheese on top and make happy faces with their pepperoni.
sentences.chinese: 他们在表面上撒上奶酪，把香肠摆成笑脸的样子。

sentences.english: Dark world the same color, he saw the smiling faces hanging from the V Akira.
sentences.chinese: 天地灰暗一色，只见彼起此伏的笑脸悬晃。

sentences.english: The landlord would smile and reduce interest by 2 percent on the peasant's debt.
sentences.chinese: 地主装出笑脸，把农民所欠的债款减去二厘利。

sentences.english: There was a pleasant smile on her face.
Her smiling face has often been caricatured on the front covers of magazines.
sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸常在杂志的封面上被画成漫画。

sentences.english: Sometimes in my dreams I see my Granduncle smiling.
sentences.chinese: 梦中常看到舅爷爷的笑脸。

sentences.english: Smilies ever be useful to more fully describe the emotions.
sentences.chinese: 笑脸永远是有用的更充分地描述感情。

sentences.english: You should have seen her smile when she saw me wearing a hat.
sentences.chinese: 你得看看她瞧见我戴帽子时的开心笑脸。

sentences.english: That smile is more likely to become a habitual smile, " noted Goodstein."
sentences.chinese: 那这种笑脸将更有可能成为一种习惯性的笑”。

sentences.english: Smile appears on her face; his happiness is apparent.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上笑脸常现，幸福昭然。

sentences.english: e.g I like a bubbly girl because she always laughs.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢活泼有活力的女生，因为她总是笑脸迎人。

sentences.english: The waitress beamed a cheerful welcome to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 女服务员对宾客笑脸相迎。

sentences.english: Their smiling faces were reflected in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 他们的笑脸映现在镜中。

sentences.english: Every one could see the joy in her smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都在她的笑脸上看到喜悦。

sentences.english: Mountain terraces, moved, farmers uncle opened smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 山间的梯田里，麦浪滚滚，农民伯伯绽开了笑脸。

definition: smiling wholeheartedly (idiom); beaming from ear to ear
to be laughing and playing/to giggle
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
to welcome sb with a smiling face (idiom)
